Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory265.png'}
{3: 'From that day on, everything about Iris has completely vanished.'}
{3: 'If the letters are not piled up in the cabinet, you might even think that this person is but a figment of your imagination.'}
{3: 'Time flies.'}
{3: 'Everything to do with that girl has been buried in a corner of your mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Until one day...'}
{3: 'A letter equally strange and familiar arrives in your mailbox.'}
{3: 'It comes across as strange because the envelope and paper used are too coarse, and there is even dirt on them.'}
{3: 'At the same time, the handwriting is familiar, for it has been etched into your memory.'}
{3: 'The content of the letter is exceedingly simple.'}
{3: 'It bears only location coordinates and a dried iris.'}
{3: 'However, the letter unlocks a dam of long-forgotten memories, and the words of past letters written gush forth, filling your mind.'}
{3: 'It all feels like it happened yesterday.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{3: 'You carry out a private investigation into the coordinates and find that they are close to a recovered city.'}
{3: 'There are no Corrupted, nor are there high levels of the Punishing Virus.'}
{3: 'You prepare yourself to head out to the coordinates on your own.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory7.jpg'}
{3: 'This is probably an abandoned opera house.'}
{3: "Even though it's already been reduced to ruins, the place still has a certain charm to it."}
{3: "It's completely silent. The only light is from the moon, shining down through the hole in the roof."}
{2: '(Follow the light forward)', 3: '29'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgUi/BgTanchuang.png'}
{3: '(Could she be here...?)'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory8.jpg'}
{3: 'You step into the opera house. She has her back to you, standing under the moonlight.'}
{3: 'Hearing the sound of footsteps, the girl slowly turns around.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A pair of iris-colored eyes gaze at me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Iris was right.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Even though the two of you have never met, you both immediately know that she is the one who has been waiting for you, and you, her.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl doesn't speak, but holds out her hand."}
{3: 'There is no need for questions nor words. When she reaches out to you, you know what it means.'}
{3: 'You put your hand in hers and cannot help shivering from its coldness.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/CgHg101.jpg'}
{3: 'But she does not let go. She starts gently humming a song, leading me into a slow dance.'}
{3: 'The tune is languid and gentle, like a whisper between lovers.'}
{3: 'There is a bit of stumbling around at the beginning, but she takes your clumsiness in stride, firmly but gently guiding you through the steps.'}
{3: 'And so you slowly get the hang of her rhythm.'}
{3: 'Just as she has said in her letter, she is an amazing lead.'}
{3: 'Or perhaps you should say that she has become an amazing lead.'}
{3: "Suddenly, there's a change in pitch and the rhythm becomes tenser and more passionate."}
{3: 'She has also changed roles, moving from lead to follow, leaving herself in your hands.'}
{3: 'And so you have to change your role too, mimicking her steps from before as the lead.'}
{3: 'The funny thing is that it is not at all exhausting. It seems that you will always know what the next step is when you dance with her.'}
{3: 'It is just like those years when you comforted her, encouraged her, watched over her, and guided her.'}
{3: 'You tilt your head, looking straight at her.'}
{3: 'Those clear, bright eyes gaze right back at you.'}
{3: 'Her eyes no longer hold the innocence she once had, but the romance still alive.'}
{3: "She's changed, yet remained the same."}
{3: 'The only thing you can be sure of is...'}
{3: 'That one step away, that distance between us, has now been traversed.'}
